formalpara.title: Thread-safe library bug
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that disabled thread safety in the libraries included with &csl_prod; for &csl_target_name;.

formalpara.title: Newlib optimized for code size
formalpara.para: The Newlib C library is now built with optimization for code size. Most speed optimizations are still enabled.

formalpara.title: Newlib C99 I/O support
formalpara.para: C99 I/O features are now enabled in the Newlib C library. This includes additional format specifiers and the vscanf and snprintf families of functions. This change may result in some increase in code size for programs using formatted I/O.

formalpara.title: ARMv7 big-endian memcpy
formalpara.para: A bug that caused memcpy to operate incorrectly for certain non-word-aligned copies in big-endian mode on ARMv7 has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Newlib update
formalpara.para: The Newlib package has been updated to version 2.4.0, git revision 6f3943bca189a934a6a04576b9a83db625a87d9f.

formalpara.title: Fix Newlib multilib ABI compatibility
formalpara.para: &csl_prod; now uses the same internal reentrancy data structures for Thumb-2 as for ARM and Thumb.

formalpara.title: Useless .eh_frame section removed from strcmp
formalpara.para: The implementation of strcmp in the Newlib C library for ARM no longer contains a useless .eh_frame section.

formalpara.title: Switch from CSLIBC to Newlib
formalpara.para: &csl_prod; now uses Newlib instead of CSLIBC. Refer to for more information about this change.

formalpara.title: Newlib update
formalpara.para: The Newlib package has been updated to version 2.2.0.
